name: Sales Person Commission
query:
SELECT
    ST.sales_person as "Sales Person:Link/Sales Person:150",
	SI.commission_type AS "Commission Type:Data:150",
	sum(base_net_total) as "Invoiced Amount (Excluding Tax):Currency:210",
	sum(total_commission) as "Total Commission:Currency:150",
	commission_rate as "Average Commission Rate (Percent):Float:250"
FROM
	`tabSales Invoice` AS SI 
INNER JOIN `tabSales Team` AS ST
on ST.parent = SI.name
AND ifnull(ST.allocated_percentage,0) = 100
WHERE
	 ifnull(SI.base_net_total, 0) > 0 and ifnull(SI.total_commission, 0) > 0
	
GROUP BY
	sales_person
ORDER BY
	"Total Commission:Currency:120"
